timeline.message:
add third tabset to preferences to hold tabs user wants hidden
- when a checkbox is selected, remove it from tabSet3
- when a checkbox is unselected, add to tabSet3
- remove code that adds all tabs to initial configuration
- account for possible null panels at configuration

update preferences to be more accurate
fix issue where tabSet3 was null
update validateAndAutoCorrect to be more flexible with valid configs
change name from tabSet3 to hiddenTabSet

add null check for when the hidden tabset is undefined
remove checks preventing no a tabset from having no tabs

make the hidden tab set act more like a visible tabset
when a user requests to view a tab from a hidden tabset, display it on a visible tab set or tabSet1

when a call to show the Help tab is made, ensure the tab is active on a visible tab set

ensure Files tab is visible when there is a request to View Working Directory

when a call to show the Help tab is made, ensure the tab is active on a visible tab set

ensure Files tab is visible when there is a request to View Working Directory
update user preferences when a tab is opened from outside of Global Options
update user preferences when a tab is opened from outside of Global Options
update user preferences when a tab is opened from outside of Global Options
fix issue where exceptions were thrown because the hidden tab panel cannot be visible
add code to build, connections, env, etc. tabs so they can be brought back without global options
add null check to prevent exceptions from moving from 1.3 to 1.2

rename allPanes to visiblePanes where appropriate, since there is now a difference
prevent a ListBox from having no name when there are no checkboxes selected
Merge branch 'master' of https://github.com/rstudio/rstudio into feature/hide-tabs
Merge branch 'master' into feature/hide-tabs

timeline.bodyText: I'd change this to follow Java setter conventions, setNeverVisible(boolean value)
timeline.author: gtritchie

timeline.message: fix function name to follow Java conventions

remove assumption that a tab panel will always have widgets, this caused issue with the hidden
'Presentation' tab in tabSet1. Update selectTab to throw Debug message when it is called on a panel
without tabs -- this should be accounted for before selectTab is called.
Merge branch 'feature/hide-tabs' of https://github.com/rstudio/rstudio into feature/hide-tabs
Merge branch 'feature/hide-tabs' of https://github.com/rstudio/rstudio into feature/hide-tabs

Add additional constructor to WorkbenchPane for an EventBus to fire ActivatePane in overridden
bringToFront. Remove sub-implementations of bringToFront that only fired ActivatePaneEvent.
Add additional null check to HelpPane to prevent attempting to refresh a window that doesn't exist,
and move refresh to below where the pane is initialized.
